furni_midAutumn_table_01.description: A long table with all kinds of festive delights laid out on top. Invite all your friends and family, and gather around the table as you enjoy the beauties of the seasons.
furni_midAutumn_table_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_stool_01.name: Round Wooden Stool
furni_midAutumn_stool_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_stool_01.description: A wooden stool found in all Yen households. With all the fine treats on the table, who wouldn't want to get seated and chow in right away?
furni_midAutumn_stool_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_stove_01.name: Originium Water Boiler
furni_midAutumn_stove_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_stove_01.description: A water boiler that uses Originium as its heat source. Brings your water to a turbulent boil, and brews up a storm in your teacups.
furni_midAutumn_stove_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_sofa_01.name: Modern Yen Chaise Lounge
furni_midAutumn_sofa_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_sofa_01.description: A traditional chaise lounge improved with western sensibilities. Why not take a quick nap before participating in the festivities again?
furni_midAutumn_sofa_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_stool2_01.name: Extended Footstool
furni_midAutumn_stool2_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_stool2_01.description: A footstool for resting your feet. Raises your poems and songs to a whole new level along with your feet.
furni_midAutumn_stool2_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_carpet_01.name: Vermillion Carpet
furni_midAutumn_carpet_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_carpet_01.description: A carpet commonly found in Yen househounds. Travel broadens yours horizons, but there is no better place to be than home when it comes time to celebrate.
furni_midAutumn_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_handLamp_01.name: Basket Lantern
furni_midAutumn_handLamp_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_handLamp_01.description: A candle-lit lantern. Its shadow twitches to the candlelight's flicker, as another year has come and pass.
furni_midAutumn_handLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_ornaments_01.name: Framed Calligraphy
furni_midAutumn_ornaments_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_ornaments_01.description: A framed calligraphy artwork. Even a few strokes scrawled on the spur of the moment can be a display for the ages.
furni_midAutumn_ornaments_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_ceilingLight_01.name: Red Silken Decorative Lamp
furni_midAutumn_ceilingLight_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_ceilingLight_01.description: A red silken decorative hanging lamp. Its frabic hangs solemnly above the hall, swaying serenely as the breeze blows past.
furni_midAutumn_ceilingLight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_ceilingLamp_01.name: Pagoda Light
furni_midAutumn_ceilingLamp_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_ceilingLamp_01.description: A hanging light shaped like a pagoda. The view of these lamps alit can jubilate masses from far and wide.
furni_midAutumn_ceilingLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_window_01.name: Panorama Display Panel (Moonlight)
furni_midAutumn_window_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_window_01.description: A display panel showcasing the full moon. Stay after moonrise tonight, for the heavenly body is a sight to be marveled at.
furni_midAutumn_window_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_wallpaper_01.name: Yen Hall Wallpaper
furni_midAutumn_wallpaper_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_wallpaper_01.description: A style of wallpaper used during Yen festivities. Its vermillion patterns rejuvenates drab walls, as lanterns light up the moon up above.
furni_midAutumn_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_floor_01.name: Yen Wooden Flooring
furni_midAutumn_floor_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_floor_01.description: Traditional wooden flooring used in Yen. Set foot on stable ground, and the confidence can carry you to new heights.
furni_midAutumn_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_fNearl_cabinet_H_01.name: Weapon Armoire
furni_fNearl_cabinet_H_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_cabinet_H_01.description: An armoire containing the Nearls' battle armor, the family heirloom. The armor's current user is Maria.

furni_fNearl_calendar_01.name: Training Calendar
furni_fNearl_calendar_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_calendar_01.description: A calendar for recording training results and competition dates. Several pages full of red checkmarks have been torn away.

furni_fNearl_sofaStool_R_01.name: Sofa Stool (Round)
furni_fNearl_sofaStool_R_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_sofaStool_R_01.description: A round, black sofa stool. When she's not standing atop the chessboard, the queen is but a meaningless carving.

furni_fNearl_sofa_M_01.name: Extended Sofa (White)
furni_fNearl_sofa_M_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_sofa_M_01.description: A soft, milk-white sofa of extended length. Just the perfect size for an exhausted knight to lie down and get some rest.
furni_fNearl_sofa_M_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_fNearl_sofa_S_01.name: Sofa for One (White)
furni_fNearl_sofa_S_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_sofa_S_01.description: A sofa, milk-white sofa. Just the perfect size for a worrywart knight to sit down and relax their mind.
furni_fNearl_sofa_S_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_fNearl_sofaStool_S_01.name: Sofa Stool (Square)
furni_fNearl_sofaStool_S_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_sofaStool_S_01.description: A large, rectangular sofa with Zofia's cape flung on top. Though it came with a cushion, a certain knight has stubbornly been placing it on other sofas.
furni_fNearl_sofaStool_S_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_fNearl_coffeeTable_01.name: Simple Coffee Table
furni_fNearl_coffeeTable_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_coffeeTable_01.description: A low coffee table with a glass top. You can't get checkmated if there isn't a king in the chess set. *Taps forehead*
furni_fNearl_coffeeTable_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_fNearl_potted_01.name: Sunflower Pot
furni_fNearl_potted_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_potted_01.description: A pot of sunflowers purchased at the florist. Judging by how it's started to wither, that was also the last time anyone has taken care of the flowers.
furni_fNearl_potted_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_fNearl_carpet_01.name: Plush Carpet (White)
furni_fNearl_carpet_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_carpet_01.description: A plush carpet that looks brand new, which either means it was recently given a deep clean, or it's actually brand new.
furni_fNearl_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_fNearl_wallDecor_01.name: Sanctified Kuranta Statue
furni_fNearl_wallDecor_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_wallDecor_01.description: An art piece from the old mansion. Mounted on the wall, just like before. "Fear neither hardship nor darkness".

furni_fNearl_banner_01.name: Decorative Banner
furni_fNearl_banner_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_banner_01.description: A banner for decorating the statue. "Darkness shan't overshadow light".

furni_fNearl_shelf_01.name: Marble Table
furni_fNearl_shelf_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_shelf_01.description: A table with an assortment of odds and ends on top: things that haven't been mailed, haven't been read, or haven't been completed.

furni_fNearl_branchDecor_01.name: "Ashen White Twig Tree"
furni_fNearl_branchDecor_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_branchDecor_01.description: A twig tree used as decoration. The best parts of the tree were used to make carbines, and the knights took home the leftovers to decorate the place.

furni_fNearl_cabinet_L_01.name: Classic Showcase
furni_fNearl_cabinet_L_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_cabinet_L_01.description: A showcase displaying all sorts of honors and trophies. A certain training maniac seems to have forgotten to put their shield back.

furni_fNearl_sink_01.name: Wash Basin
furni_fNearl_sink_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_sink_01.description: An expensive wash basin placed next to the door. Knights are to wash their hands after returning from duty, and it's often used to wash up, both hands and faces.

furni_fNearl_wateringCan_01.name: Watering Can
furni_fNearl_wateringCan_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_wateringCan_01.description: A watering can with a narrow spout used to water indoor plants. It's so seldom used that you could probably plant something inside.

furni_fNearl_ceilingLight_01.name: Jade Ceiling Light (Large)
furni_fNearl_ceilingLight_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_ceilingLight_01.description: A large jade ceiling light with multiple lamps. Cheap and affordable. Casts lots of shadows on wherever it illuminates.

furni_fNearl_ceilingLight2_01.name: Jade Ceiling Lamp (Small)
furni_fNearl_ceilingLight2_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_ceilingLight2_01.description: A small jade ceiling light. Cheap and affordable. Never lights up a place enough.

furni_fNearl_wallpaper_01.name: Knightly Noble Wallpaper
furni_fNearl_wallpaper_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_wallpaper_01.description: Wallpaper commonly used by knights and nobility. Instead of a room that could be described as knightly, Maria would rather have her own workshop.

furni_fNearl_floor_01.name: Knightly Noble Floor Tiles
furni_fNearl_floor_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_floor_01.description: Floor tiles commonly used by knights and nobility. Zofia doesn't mull over the details, and just lets her designers do their job unattended.

furni_activity_ceiling_01.name: Hanging Wooden Pallet
furni_activity_ceiling_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_ceiling_01.description: A handmade decorative pallet hung on the ceiling with lights installed. Don't jump on top of it, don't hang yourself upside down from it, and definitely don't fall asleep while doing that!
furni_activity_ceiling_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_hangingChair_01.name: Swingy Sofa
furni_activity_hangingChair_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_hangingChair_01.description: An extra comfy hammock sofa. Can be used as a bed. Suzuran can sometimes be seen lounging on the sofa with her tails stretched.
furni_activity_hangingChair_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_fence_V_01.name: Wooden Stakes (Vertical)
furni_activity_fence_V_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_fence_V_01.description: A set of wooden stakes installed vertically. Kids frequently get their hands stuck between the gaps.
furni_activity_fence_V_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_column_01.name: Palisade Pillar
furni_activity_column_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_column_01.description: A pillar used with the stakes. Very sturdy. Not even Popukar can break it... probably.
furni_activity_column_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_fence_S_01.name: Wooden Stakes (Horizontal)
furni_activity_fence_S_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_fence_S_01.description: A set of wooden stakes installed horizontally. Kids like to grind their nails with it.
furni_activity_fence_S_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_rod_01.name: Wooden Hanging Rod
furni_activity_rod_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_rod_01.description: A rod used to decorate the playroom. The rod was installed by renovation operators, while the rope and the flags were added by the young operators.
furni_activity_rod_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_carpet_01.name: Puzzle Carpet
furni_activity_carpet_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_carpet_01.description: A carpet woven by the kid operators with the help of a weaver. You could probably make a felt cloth about the size of a cup with all that fur (or perhaps hair) that gets vacuumed out each day.
furni_activity_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_showcase_01.name: Water-filled Showcase
furni_activity_showcase_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_showcase_01.description: A wall-mounted showcase simulating an underwater environment. This is how a lot of our little buddies learn about life underwater.
furni_activity_showcase_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_cabinet_01.name: Toy Cabinet
furni_activity_cabinet_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_cabinet_01.description: A modified sliding door kitchen cabinet. This is where our little buddies store their favorite toys.
furni_activity_cabinet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_potted_01.name: Leafy Green Plant
furni_activity_potted_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_potted_01.description: A fast-growing potted plant. Doesn't seem to have been overwatered. If Bubble is in the room, be sure to keep her away from the plant!
furni_activity_potted_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_refrigerator_01.name: Big Tumbly Fridge
furni_activity_refrigerator_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_refrigerator_01.description: A washing machine modified into a refrigerator. The fridge has been filled up with snacks. Having lots of candy and desserts is good for both your body and mind. All the little ones know that.
furni_activity_refrigerator_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_downlight_01.name: Rectangular Brass Ceiling Light
furni_activity_downlight_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_downlight_01.description: A rectangular brass ceiling light, bathing the room in light all while warmly overwatching the children during their playtime.
furni_activity_downlight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_stool_01.name: Little Yellow Stool
furni_activity_stool_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_stool_01.description: The youngsters' favorite round little stool. For safety reasons, the seat is not rotatable.
furni_activity_stool_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_artSet_01.name: Watercolor Painting Set
furni_activity_artSet_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_artSet_01.description: A set of watercolors for children. Everyone who has taken a painting class knows that you'd get kicked out by the art teacher if you dared to put paper underneath the easel. Thankfully, this is just a toy set.
furni_activity_artSet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_calendar_01.name: Funtimes Calendar
furni_activity_calendar_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_calendar_01.description: A calendar that marks all the game room activities. As the young operators look forward to each coming day, they are also growing day by day.
furni_activity_calendar_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_tent_01.name: Happy Breaktime Tent
furni_activity_tent_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_tent_01.description: A comfy little tent. Big enough for a little operator to fall asleep inside.
furni_activity_tent_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_handLamp_01.name: Bamboo Originium Lantern
furni_activity_handLamp_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_handLamp_01.description: An Originium lamp placed inside a bamboo basket. Very safe. There is actually a glass shield inside the lantern, keeping the more curious kids from hurting themselves.
furni_activity_handLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_lowPartition_01.name: Stubby Low Wall
furni_activity_lowPartition_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_lowPartition_01.description: A low wall made specifically based on how tall the young operators are. There is a can of ball-shaped candy on the wall. Don't eat too many of them at once.
furni_activity_lowPartition_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_halfColumn_01.name: Low Wall Pillar
furni_activity_halfColumn_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_halfColumn_01.description: A pillar that goes with the low wall. It really puts your mind at ease knowing that you're enveloped.
furni_activity_halfColumn_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_wallpaper_01.name: Cartoon Wallpaper
furni_activity_wallpaper_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_wallpaper_01.description: A wallpaper designed by the children themselves. They had never been happier, seeing their own doodles turn into reality. On the wall, at least.
furni_activity_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_floor_01.name: Sparkling Clean Flooring
furni_activity_floor_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_activity_floor_01.description: Floorboards that the kids helped install. It's so much fun to do your part putting the room together while learning about responsibility.
furni_activity_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_kitchen_bed_01.name: Simple Bed
furni_kitchen_bed_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_bed_01.description: An undecorated bed. Simple and clean.

furni_kitchen_framed_01.name: Photoless Frames
furni_kitchen_framed_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_framed_01.description: A set of photo frames of different sizes. Let your imaginations run wild.

furni_kitchen_airPurifier_01.name: Air Purifier
furni_kitchen_airPurifier_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_airPurifier_01.description: A must-have machine for maintaining the room's air quality. Like a breath of fresh air.

furni_kitchen_partition_01.name: Area Separation Decoration
furni_kitchen_partition_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_partition_01.description: A designer decoration used to partition an open space. Like a clean cut.

furni_kitchen_ceilingLight_01.name: Round Decorative Lighting
furni_kitchen_ceilingLight_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_ceilingLight_01.description: A small decorative light source that helps enhance the room's appearance. A bright idea.

furni_kitchen_wallSticker_01.name: Rock Wallpaper
furni_kitchen_wallSticker_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_wallSticker_01.description: A set of black stone peels made using the highest quality materia. Naturally hard as a rock yet mismatched.

furni_kitchen_carpet_01.name: Thin Rug
furni_kitchen_carpet_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_carpet_01.description: A rug added out of practicality. Snug as a bug in a rug.

furni_kitchen_downlight_01.name: Ceiling Panel Lighting
furni_kitchen_downlight_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_downlight_01.description: A large light panel that illuminates the whole room. Fluorescent and lustrous.

furni_kitchen_ceiling_01.name: Ceiling Light Fixture
furni_kitchen_ceiling_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_ceiling_01.description: A suspended light fixture that brightens up the area underneath. This unique light is bound to not leave you hanging.

furni_kitchen_lamp_01.name: Tripod Lamp

furni_kitchen_lamp_01.description: A tripod floor lamp that adds a warm glow to your decor, yet can stand on its own.

furni_kitchen_wallArt_01.name: Modern Artpiece
furni_kitchen_wallArt_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_wallArt_01.description: A wall art that will only be understood by its creator. It's art for art's sake.

furni_kitchen_ceilingLamps_01.name: Hanging Lights
furni_kitchen_ceilingLamps_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_ceilingLamps_01.description: A set of ceiling lights arranged specifically for the perfect balance, all in harmony with one another.

furni_kitchen_worktop_01.name: Embedded Kitchen Unit
furni_kitchen_worktop_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_worktop_01.description: A complete kitchen unit built into the wall. Perfect for cooking and include everything but the kitchen sink.

furni_kitchen_islandWorktop_01.name: Multipurpose Counter Space
furni_kitchen_islandWorktop_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_islandWorktop_01.description: A counter space designed for many different purposes. The possibilities are endless.

furni_kitchen_oven_01.name: Upright Kitchen Set
furni_kitchen_oven_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_oven_01.description: A vertical kitchen set with built-in storage. Keeps your kitchen in apple-pie order.

furni_kitchen_stool_01.name: Simple Kitchen Stool
furni_kitchen_stool_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_stool_01.description: A stool made using the minimum amount of materials. Practical and understated, just the bare necessities.

furni_kitchen_pottedPlant_01.name: Tall Potted Plant
furni_kitchen_pottedPlant_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_pottedPlant_01.description: A unique, different, yet indispensable potted plant. Adds a touch of nature.

furni_kitchen_wallpaper_01.name: Minimalist Wallpaper
furni_kitchen_wallpaper_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_wallpaper_01.description: A minimalistic wallpaper design. Its uniform design helps you see what sticks on the wall.

furni_kitchen_floor_01.name: Minimalist Flooring
furni_kitchen_floor_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_floor_01.description: A minimally-processed flooring design. Helps you break new ground.

furni_prison_device_01.name: Safety Inspection Device
furni_prison_device_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_device_01.description: A large device used to check for carried items when inmates move about the prison. The circulation of goods amongst inmates must be strictly controlled.

furni_prison_waitingArea_01.name: Security Equipment
furni_prison_waitingArea_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_waitingArea_01.description: Electronic equipment that will sound an alarm and alert the guards when it detects inmates carrying out prohibited actions. It is often out of service due to "unknown reasons".
furni_prison_waitingArea_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_prison_partition1_01.name: Barrier
furni_prison_partition1_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_partition1_01.description: A measure to block off areas and limit the inmates' freedom of movement. "You, over here. New guy, that side."

furni_prison_ceilingLight_01.name: Prison Cell Ceiling Light
furni_prison_ceilingLight_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_ceilingLight_01.description: Lighting fixtures specially developed and produced in Columbia, with an extremely low rate of failure. Because of that, the prison guards can easily attribute any damage to the lighting to the inmates' misbehavior.

furni_prison_vent_01.name: Prison Cell Vent
furni_prison_vent_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_vent_01.description: An indispensable piece of ventilation equipment for confined spaces. Fresh air is one of the few mercies granted to the inmates, and they regard it as a beloved treasure.
furni_prison_vent_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_prison_chair_01.name: Prison Chair with Handcuffs
furni_prison_chair_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_chair_01.description: A folding chair equipped with restricting handcuffs. The prison administration had no choice but to add that function to avoid inmates using it as a weapon.

furni_prison_washbasin_01.name: Water Containers
furni_prison_washbasin_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_washbasin_01.description: Just a regular basin and bucket. Prisoners are people too, and people need to live.

furni_prison_mirror_01.name: Embedded Glass Mirror
furni_prison_mirror_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_mirror_01.description: A glass mirror produced and installed according to the designated specifications. Not a single part of it can be used to create weapons or escape tools.

furni_prison_sink_01.name: Personal Wash Basin
furni_prison_sink_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_sink_01.description: Basic washing equipment. The amount of water inmates can use is strictly rationed. This allows the inmates to take care of their hygiene and maintain a basic level of decency.

furni_prison_toilet_01.name: Individual Toilet Bowl
furni_prison_toilet_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_toilet_01.description: A standard toilet bowl recently installed across the entire prison. Many of the inmates have never used a toilet bowl before, so they often engage in all sorts of shenanigans when taking care of basic needs.

furni_prison_pipeline_01.name: Exposed Piping
furni_prison_pipeline_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_pipeline_01.description: Exposed water pipes, for ease of maintenance. Rumors say that unruly inmates will be intentionally assigned to cells with broken water pipes.

furni_prison_ceiling_01.name: Metal Suspended Ceiling with Fans
furni_prison_ceiling_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_ceiling_01.description: A metal suspended ceiling with two fans attached. Since they cannot control the fans, the inmates believe that the administration are just installing the fans for show.

furni_prison_bed_01.name: Double Decker Metal Bed
furni_prison_bed_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_bed_01.description: A metal bed that can be used by two inmates. Special considerations aside, the weaker inmate is often forced to sleep on the upper layer.

furni_prison_partition2_01.name: Half-open Long Bench
furni_prison_partition2_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_partition2_01.description: A long bench with a partition, it can be used for both storage and rest. It's not wrong to say that it's the only recreational facility in the prison cell.

furni_prison_thermos_01.name: High-capacity Hot Water Kettle
furni_prison_thermos_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_thermos_01.description: A hot water kettle used to store drinking water. Water is hope, and hot water is greater than hope.

furni_prison_wallpaper_01.name: Prison Wall
furni_prison_wallpaper_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_wallpaper_01.description: Mansfield Prison standard concrete wall. The administration will never allow any inmate the chance to escape.
furni_prison_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_prison_floor_01.name: Prison Tiles
furni_prison_floor_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_prison_floor_01.description: Mansfield Prison standard floor tiles. There are often all sorts of excuses for inmates to cast their gazes at further places instead.
furni_prison_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_MA2020_rabbit_01.name: Futuristic Kitty Bank
furni_MA2020_rabbit_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_MA2020_rabbit_01.description: An automatic bunny pestle and mortar. When nobody is watching, this cute machine will quickly and silently mash up medicinal materials with the stone pestle.

furni_oct1st_seating_01.name: Relaxing Rocking Chair
furni_oct1st_seating_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_oct1st_seating_01.description: This oval-shaped, comfortable-looking chair is simply irresistible. Dominate your downtime with this lazy sofa and soundproof sleeping cabin.

furni_duanwu_lazysofa_01.name: Zongzi Beanie Bag
furni_duanwu_lazysofa_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_duanwu_lazysofa_01.description: A bean bag sofa in the shape of a traditional Yen delicacy. Is often frequented by a certain high-profile visitor from Yen who refuses to separate from it.

furni_act12d0_throne_01.name: Warchief’s Throne
furni_act12d0_throne_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act12d0_throne_01.description: All the strongest warriors are qualified to sit upon this throne. This so-called “qualification” is to beat down any who aren’t so convinced.

furni_act10d5_sideboard_01.name: Ursus Tableware Cabinet
furni_act10d5_sideboard_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act10d5_sideboard_01.description: Several sets of ceramic and glass tableware belonging to Rosa. Her tastes are just as hard to change as her status.

furni_act10d5_coatRack_01.name: Brand New Uniform
furni_act10d5_coatRack_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act10d5_coatRack_01.description: An Ursus uniform that has never been worn. Once, Absinthe dreamed of donning it. Now, she doesn't even have the courage to look at it.

furni_act10d5_plushBear_01.name: Oversized Ursus Doll
furni_act10d5_plushBear_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act10d5_plushBear_01.description: This Ursus doll belonging to Istina is even bigger than Gummy. She heard once that having something huge and cute can provide an unparalleled sense of security.

furni_act10d5_walldecoKit_01.name: Miscellaneous Wall Decorations
furni_act10d5_walldecoKit_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act10d5_walldecoKit_01.description: A miscellaneous assortment of things hanging on the wall, ranging from clocks to portraits to porcelain plates. Can stagnation, conflagration, shattering, and destruction become the best of memories?

furni_act10d5_banner_01.name: Club Poster
furni_act10d5_banner_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act10d5_banner_01.description: An Ursus student club signboard hand-made by Gummy. One can envision happiness, but they can also envision reality.

furni_act10d5_honeyDrink_01.name: Ursus-style Honey Drink
furni_act10d5_honeyDrink_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act10d5_honeyDrink_01.description: A sweet and refreshing honey drink that keeps Leto in a good mood. Drink deeply and seek solace in sweet chaos.

furni_act9d0_carpet_01.name: Commemorative Anniversary Carpet
furni_act9d0_carpet_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act9d0_carpet_01.description: A special carpet made to commemorate the First Anniversary of Arknights. Printed with a familiar rabbit motif, it was gifted to the Doctor by the residents of Rhodes Island.

furni_act9d0_bed_01.name: Commemorative Anniversary Bed
furni_act9d0_bed_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act9d0_bed_01.description: A luxurious bed made to commemorate the First Anniversary of Arknights. The non-combat Operators of Rhodes Island prepared this gift to the Doctor, an opulent bed filled with an air of festivity.

furni_act9d0_walllamp_01.name: Commemorative Anniversary Wall Lamp
furni_act9d0_walllamp_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act9d0_walllamp_01.description: A special wall lamp made to commemorate the First Anniversary of Arknights. This peculiarly-installed wall lamp was a way for the Rhodes Island combat operators to express their thanks towards the Doctor.

furni_act7d5_bookshelf.name: Modular Bookshelf
furni_act7d5_bookshelf.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act7d5_bookshelf.description: The shelves in the dormitory of Reserve Team A6 are filled with books that the members liked to read. Each person is assigned a different part of the shelf depending on their height, but they would often read each other's books.

furni_act7d5_atomicClock.name: Rhine Lab Atomic Clock
furni_act7d5_atomicClock.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act7d5_atomicClock.description: An absolutely accurate clock found in Ptilopsis's room. She has already calculated what needs to be done for each second of the day.

furni_act7d5_weaponRack.name: Ceobe's Weapon Rack
furni_act7d5_weaponRack.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act7d5_weaponRack.description: The weapon rack Ceobe uses when she's resting. She spent many years convincing herself that her weapons must never leave her hands, but learnt within days that weapons could also be placed within a rack.

furni_act7d5_wallSticker.name: Motivational Poster
furni_act7d5_wallSticker.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act7d5_wallSticker.description: Motivational posters in the training room. Give it to friends who are still on the fence about joining Rhodes Island, come on!

furni_act7d5_petHouse.name: Kuro's New Home
furni_act7d5_petHouse.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act7d5_petHouse.description: A small pet house that Vanilla prepared for the Originium slug, Kuro. After going through a lot of bureaucratic red tape, Vanilla finally got permission to raise the slug, so now Kuro can have a home!

furni_act7d5_apron.name: Home-Use Apron
furni_act7d5_apron.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act7d5_apron.description: An ordinary apron purchased from the supermarket, suitable for doing various chores around the ship. Operators with horns might have some trouble putting it on.

furni_act14d0_arcadegame_01.name: Fan Appreciation Slot Machine
furni_act14d0_arcadegame_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_act14d0_arcadegame_01.description: Closure's favorite brand new gaming machine. No coins needed. Just hit start and enjoy the game.

furni_tangyuan_ceiling_01.name: Inscribed Ceiling Plaque (Sweet Sesame Dumplings)
furni_tangyuan_ceiling_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_tangyuan_ceiling_01.description: Another sign commonly found hanging overhead in the food courts of Lungmen. Black sesame dumplings are sticky, sweet, and best served piping hot.

furni_tangyuan_priceList_01.name: Menu (Sweet Sesame Dumplings)
furni_tangyuan_priceList_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_tangyuan_priceList_01.description: Another menu commonly found in the food courts of Lungmen. The food and the tea keep coming out, and the aroma never ceases either.

furni_NY2020_wallpaper_01.name: Lungmen New Impressions Wallpaper
furni_NY2020_wallpaper_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_NY2020_wallpaper_01.description: A special wallpaper celebrating the New Year in Lungmen. It blends more familiar aspects of Lungmen with avant-garde art.

furni_NY2020_floor_01.name: Lungmen New Impressions Floorboards
furni_NY2020_floor_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_NY2020_floor_01.description: Sparkly-clean floor tiles celebrating the New Year in Lungmen. The staff has been hard at work for quite some time. Does it look as good as new now?

furni_obsidianFestival_DJBooth_01.name: "Extreme" Mixting Table
furni_obsidianFestival_DJBooth_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_obsidianFestival_DJBooth_01.description: A mixing table with special lighting effects. Experiments have shown that applying Originium Arts in regular intervals improves the rhythm and atmosphere of the performance.
furni_obsidianFestival_DJBooth_01.obtainApproach: Heart of Surging Flame Milestone Rewards

furni_obsidianFestival_soundSystem_01.name: "Professional" Speaker System
furni_obsidianFestival_soundSystem_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_obsidianFestival_soundSystem_01.description: A set of professional stage speakers designed specifically for live shows. The quality is top notch, and the price tag reflects that.
furni_obsidianFestival_soundSystem_01.obtainApproach: Heart of Surging Flame Milestone Rewards

furni_obsidianFestival_portableSpeaker_0.name: "Stylish" Portable Stereo
furni_obsidianFestival_portableSpeaker_0.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_obsidianFestival_portableSpeaker_0.description: An awesome-looking portable speaker. Fitted with some necessary decorations to better suit the atmosphere. Just seeing it makes one want to groove to their favorite beats.
furni_obsidianFestival_portableSpeaker_0.obtainApproach: Heart of Surging Flame Milestone Rewards

furni_dropS002_abbeyRoad_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS002_abbeyRoad_01.description: "Time and legend passed away together, but the melody still lingers in that city, soothing the frustrated.”

furni_dropS003_peanuts_01.name: Plaque - Peanuts
furni_dropS003_peanuts_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS003_peanuts_01.description: "The seeds begin to grow when they fall into the soil, but they forget that they are allergic to maturity."
furni_dropS003_peanuts_01.obtainApproach: Dropped from the first clear reward of Challenge Mode 5-3

furni_dropS003_meno_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS003_meno_01.description: "Stepping forward is no big deal, because an uninvited guest may appear with each step. So, only the result matters."
furni_dropS003_meno_01.obtainApproach: Dropped from the first clear reward of Challenge Mode 5-7

furni_dropS003_asLongAsFar_01.name: Plaque - Legend
furni_dropS003_asLongAsFar_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.

furni_dropS003_asLongAsFar_01.obtainApproach: Dropped from the first clear reward of Challenge Mode 5-10

furni_dropS003_fabric_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS003_fabric_01.description: "Compared with implementing, designing may be more valuable in terms of creativity, but they are equally necessary to get the final result. "

furni_dropS003_zero_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS003_zero_01.description: “Maybe there will be a language one day that we cannot understand, but that perhaps is only a testament to our superficiality. "
furni_dropS003_zero_01.obtainApproach: Dropped from the first clear reward of H5-4

furni_dropS004_daftPunk_01.name: Plaque - Whole Day
furni_dropS004_daftPunk_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS004_daftPunk_01.description: "We stay in the bed all day just to become each other's lucky unicorn. "

furni_dropS004_giorgioMoroder_01.name: Plaque - Dream
furni_dropS004_giorgioMoroder_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS004_giorgioMoroder_01.description: "May visions become reality, and dreams come true on Terra. "

furni_dropS004_kraftwerk_01.name: Plaque - Electric Men
furni_dropS004_kraftwerk_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS004_kraftwerk_01.description: "We are the robots, and we are charging. "

furni_dropS004_YMO_01.name: Plaque - Mask
furni_dropS004_YMO_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS004_YMO_01.description: “Laugh at the passage of time, and weep at the passage of life. "

furni_dropS004_deadBySunrise_01.name: Plaque - Too Early
furni_dropS004_deadBySunrise_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS004_deadBySunrise_01.description: "It's too soon to turn back, but too late to hear your voice. "

furni_dropS005_nosferatu_01.name: Plaque - Ruthless
furni_dropS005_nosferatu_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS005_nosferatu_01.description: "Our company would like to purchase this castle."

furni_dropS005_sedmikrasky_01.name: Plaque - Mary
furni_dropS005_sedmikrasky_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS005_sedmikrasky_01.description: "They have nothing to do with this. Their colors are spread across every film, but they don't care."

furni_dropS006_theHolyMountain_01.name: Plaque - Hallucination
furni_dropS006_theHolyMountain_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS006_theHolyMountain_01.description: "Hurry up and go, do you really want to stick around to hear his nagging?"
furni_dropS006_theHolyMountain_01.obtainApproach: Dropped from the first clear reward of Challenge Mode SA-6

furni_dropS006_suspiria_01.name: Plaque - Warmth
furni_dropS006_suspiria_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS006_suspiria_01.description: "Maternal love still flows within you. It's time to give it back."
furni_dropS006_suspiria_01.obtainApproach: Dropped from the first clear reward of 6-16

furni_dropS006_oceans12_01.name: Plaque - Convergence
furni_dropS006_oceans12_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS006_oceans12_01.description: "We must voice our dissent through justice and a unified voice."
furni_dropS006_oceans12_01.obtainApproach: Dropped from the first clear reward of H6-4

furni_dropS007_repulsion_01.name: Plaque - Recognition
furni_dropS007_repulsion_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS007_repulsion_01.description: "It is me. It is not me. Who am I?"

furni_dropS007_easyRider_01.name: Plaque - The Ride
furni_dropS007_easyRider_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS007_easyRider_01.description: A dirt road leads into the distance.
furni_dropS007_easyRider_01.obtainApproach: Dropped from the first clear reward of H7-4

furni_dropS009_dasRheingold_01.name: Plaque - Finest Riches
furni_dropS009_dasRheingold_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS009_dasRheingold_01.description: "All the wealth in the world resides within this ring. You will find it easy to make it yours, just like so many before you have."

furni_dropS009_carmen_01.name: Plaque - Enthusiasm
furni_dropS009_carmen_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS009_carmen_01.description: "The fiery Sarkaz dancer can calm the storm; but when the tempest stirs within her, who will bring her peace?"

furni_dropS009_faust_01.name: Plaque - Faust
furni_dropS009_faust_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS009_faust_01.description: "Look, even the devil writhes after partaking of your soul. He is just like you, with no sweetness following the bitterness."
furni_dropS009_faust_01.obtainApproach: Dropped from the first clear reward of Challenge Mode M8-8

furni_dropS009_laBoheme_01.name: Plaque - True Love
furni_dropS009_laBoheme_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS009_laBoheme_01.description: "You've only met each other a few times. How can there be any eternal love?" "History will know that my love for her was long enough."

furni_dropS009_siegfried_01.name: Plaque - Butcher
furni_dropS009_siegfried_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS009_siegfried_01.description: "Chapter after chapter, the hero's cause is composed in red. When he swung his sword to sever the last bit of evil, his paean came to an abrupt end."
furni_dropS009_siegfried_01.obtainApproach: Dropped from the first clear reward of H8-4

furni_dropS009_magicFlute_01.name: Plaque - Day and Night
furni_dropS009_magicFlute_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS009_magicFlute_01.description: "Everything in the world changes, like day and night turning on an axis. The balance of the cosmos has been skewed, so where will your weight fall?"
furni_dropS009_magicFlute_01.obtainApproach: Dropped from the first clear reward of Challenge Mode SV-7

furni_dropS009_etudeOp10No12_01.name: Plaque - Resistance
furni_dropS009_etudeOp10No12_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS009_etudeOp10No12_01.description: "I have gathered my comrades to sing songs of praise for everyone. But what can you gain from this sad act of aggression? The land of Kazimierz shall never belong to you."

furni_dropS009_fantaisieOp49_01.name: Plaque - Imagination
furni_dropS009_fantaisieOp49_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS009_fantaisieOp49_01.description: "Unable to describe or transmit your hopes and dreams? Why not pick up an instrument, and spread your emotions with strings, pipes, and keys?

furni_dropS009_nocturnesOp9_01.name: Plaque - Tranquil
furni_dropS009_nocturnesOp9_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropS009_nocturnesOp9_01.description: "The candle's light burns dimly on a silent night. The cold and hunger have finally left him. How beautiful this dream is… Goodbye, my friend."

furni_contract_s0_01.name: Barrenland Pennant
furni_contract_s0_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_contract_s0_01.description: The flag of a once-prosperous nomadic city. Though unfortunately destroyed by a Catastrophe, the flag was restored by survivors to commemorate it.

furni_contract_s1_01.name: Pyrite Pennant
furni_contract_s1_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_contract_s1_01.description: The banner of a legendary mercenary team, wiped out during a Contingency Contract mission. The banner was restored by Catastrophe Messengers to commemorate them.

furni_contract_s2_01.name: Blade Pennant
furni_contract_s2_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_contract_s2_01.description: A pennant with the mark of a long-lost weapon. Though the weapon itself has long been sundered, its likeness was restored by adherents to commemorate it.

furni_contract_s3_01.name: Cinder Pennant
furni_contract_s3_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_contract_s3_01.description: A pennant with the personal seal of a certain Catastrophe Messenger. Though the messenger lost her life during a Catastrophe long ago, the seal she left behind has been restored by the locals to commemorate her.

furni_taptap_arcadegame_01.name: Taptap Arcade
furni_taptap_arcadegame_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_taptap_arcadegame_01.description: An arcade machine given by a company to Rhodes Island. It may be able to store a countless number of games.

furni_bilibili_carpet_01.name: Bilibili Carpet
furni_bilibili_carpet_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_bilibili_carpet_01.description: A carpet woven with a cute mascot. It feels soft and delicate, which makes people want to roll on it. But in fact, the manufacturer has no interest in the carpet industry.

furni_event_lazyPillow_01.name: Rabbit-like Bean Bag Sofa
furni_event_lazyPillow_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_event_lazyPillow_01.description: It looks like a big cute rabbit, and feels like one too.

furni_team001_blackSteel_target_01.name: Liskarm's Training Target
furni_team001_blackSteel_target_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_team001_blackSteel_target_01.description: A target Liskarm often uses during training. The one in that photo often makes fun of her.

furni_team001_followers_ceilingLight_01.name: Ceiling Light Made By Sarkaz
furni_team001_followers_ceilingLight_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_team001_followers_ceilingLight_01.description: A ceiling light designed by Shining. The diffuse light has nothing to do with its design.

furni_team001_ursus_baseballStand_01.name: Self-goverment Group Bat Rack
furni_team001_ursus_baseballStand_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_team001_ursus_baseballStand_01.description: A bat rack of the Ursus Student Self-Government Group. Occasionally they will get together to play baseball.
furni_team001_ursus_baseballStand_01.obtainApproach: Ursus Student Self-Government Group Trust collection

furni_team001_opdaA1_coatRack_01.name: Dorm Tree-shaped Coat Rack
furni_team001_opdaA1_coatRack_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_team001_opdaA1_coatRack_01.description: A rack for Operators of Reserve Op Team A1 to hang clothes. It makes them feel relaxed and at home after missions.
furni_team001_opdaA1_coatRack_01.obtainApproach: Reserve Op Team A1 Trust collection

furni_team001_opdaA4_coatRack_01.name: Dorm Coat Rack with Ring Top
furni_team001_opdaA4_coatRack_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_team001_opdaA4_coatRack_01.description: A rack for Operators of Reserve Op Team A4 to hang clothes. The indoor temperature is still relatively high.
furni_team001_opdaA4_coatRack_01.obtainApproach: Reserve Op Team A4 Trust collection

furni_team001_kjerag_fireplaceTool_01.name: Fireplace Tool Set of Karlan
furni_team001_kjerag_fireplaceTool_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_team001_kjerag_fireplaceTool_01.description: A fireplace tool set commonly used by Kjerag people. It will be a warm winter.

furni_team001_penguin_frame_01.name: Emperor's Picture Frame
furni_team001_penguin_frame_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_team001_penguin_frame_01.description: A portrait of the Emperor. How’s it goin’, brutha?

furni_team001_rhine_cultivationPool_01.name: Lab Tank
furni_team001_rhine_cultivationPool_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_team001_rhine_cultivationPool_01.description: An eco-tank with unknown creatures in it. They do look a bit similar to things we’re more familiar with though.

furni_team001_lungmen_diningCar_01.name: Lungmen Breakfast Cart
furni_team001_lungmen_diningCar_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_team001_lungmen_diningCar_01.description: A breakfast cart commonly seen in Lungmen. The Lungmen specialties on it are popular among the L.G.D.

furni_team001_victoria_graffiti_01.name: Glasgow Graffiti
furni_team001_victoria_graffiti_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_team001_victoria_graffiti_01.description: Londinium used to be covered with this distinctive Glasgow-style graffiti.

furni_team001_odaA4_boardGameTable_01.name: Dorm Board Game Table
furni_team001_odaA4_boardGameTable_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_team001_odaA4_boardGameTable_01.description: Reserve Op Team A4 used to play tabletop games here. A new character card will be filled out tonight.

furni_team002_opdaA6_gacha_01.name: Strange Gashapon Machine in the Aisle
furni_team002_opdaA6_gacha_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_team002_opdaA6_gacha_01.description: A gashapon machine in the charge of Orchid. The toys in it are handmade by Spot, and they are Catapult and Popukar's favorite. Midnight ends up paying the bill.
furni_team002_opdaA6_gacha_01.obtainApproach: Reserve Op Team A6 Trust collection

furni_team002_abyssal_trident_01.name: Ægir's Mysterious Pedestal
furni_team002_abyssal_trident_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_team002_abyssal_trident_01.description: The stone pedestal of a weapon. The original weapon was long lost, but someone replaced it with a movie prop.

furni_team002_sweep_weaponRack_01.name: "Twilight"
furni_team002_sweep_weaponRack_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_team002_sweep_weaponRack_01.description: A big floor clock constructed using a special technique. The hands keep turning, but its low rumble signifies the passing of life.

furni_single001_conicalCeilingLight_01.name: Half-closed Ceiling Light
furni_single001_conicalCeilingLight_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_single001_conicalCeilingLight_01.description: A uniquely shaped ceiling light. The shape does not affect its lighting function.

furni_single001_shelf_01.name: Assembled Stackable Shelf
furni_single001_shelf_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_single001_shelf_01.description: An assembled stackable shelf which has a rather complex structure.

furni_single001_mahjongTable_01.name: Black Mahjong Table
furni_single001_mahjongTable_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_single001_mahjongTable_01.description: A black mahjong table. It's said that the early mahjong was made from strange plants.

furni_single001_mahjongChair_L_01.name: Brown Mahjong Chair (Left)
furni_single001_mahjongChair_L_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_single001_mahjongChair_L_01.description: A mahjong chair with brown cushion. Gang.

furni_single001_mahjongChair_R_01.name: Brown Mahjong Chair (Right)
furni_single001_mahjongChair_R_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_single001_mahjongChair_R_01.description: A mahjong chair with brown cushion. Peng.

furni_single001_boardGameTable_01.name: White Board Game Table
furni_single001_boardGameTable_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_single001_boardGameTable_01.description: A table used by Operators to play various games. Pick up the entire stack!

furni_single001_catClimbingFrame_01.name: Small Recreational Structure
furni_single001_catClimbingFrame_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_single001_catClimbingFrame_01.description: Even Operators can have fun here! It’s become quite popular.

furni_single001_layerStack_01.name: Jenga
furni_single001_layerStack_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_single001_layerStack_01.description: A source of entertainment for many Operators, particularly in the moment when everything falls apart spectacularly. This game is said to have helped reveal parts of many an Operator’s past.

furni_single001_newspaperStool_01.name: Handmade Newspaper Stool
furni_single001_newspaperStool_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_single001_newspaperStool_01.description: A derivative work of a famous architect who builds houses with paper. People can't believe they can actually sit on a paper stool.

furni_single001_printer_01.name: Simple Printer
furni_single001_printer_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_single001_printer_01.description: A simple printer that can print documents.

furni_single001_vendingMachine_01.name: Refrigerated Vending Machine
furni_single001_vendingMachine_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_single001_vendingMachine_01.description: A vending machine that sells a variety of refrigerated foods. The temperature is the same all year round.

furni_single001_letterLight_0_01.name: O-shaped Light
furni_single001_letterLight_0_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_single001_letterLight_0_01.description: A wall light designed in the shape of the symbol of genesis.

furni_single001_letterLight_1_01.name: I-shaped Light
furni_single001_letterLight_1_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_single001_letterLight_1_01.description: A wall light designed in the shape of the symbol of growth.

furni_dropN001_box_01.name: Black Material Box
furni_dropN001_box_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_box_01.description: A black material box. The goods in it are intact.

furni_dropN001_box_02.name: White Material Box
furni_dropN001_box_02.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_box_02.description: A white material box. The goods are protected by the solid box.

furni_dropN001_box_03.name: Olive-green Material Box
furni_dropN001_box_03.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_box_03.description: An olive-green materials box. It compels people to open it.

furni_dropN001_generator_01.name: Green Dynamo
furni_dropN001_generator_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_generator_01.description: A green dynamo that uses Originium to generate electrical power.

furni_dropN001_generator_02.name: Orange Dynamo
furni_dropN001_generator_02.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_generator_02.description: An orange dynamo, a small power-generation equipment.

furni_dropN001_generator_03.name: White Dynamo
furni_dropN001_generator_03.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_generator_03.description: A white dynamo useful in times of power failure.

furni_dropN001_sculptureColumn_01.name: Bonding Column
furni_dropN001_sculptureColumn_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_sculptureColumn_01.description: A column with a strange look. Its shape still seems to be changing slowly.

furni_dropN001_vineColumn_01.name: Vine Column
furni_dropN001_vineColumn_01.usage: Can be used to decorate the dorm and improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_vineColumn_01.description: A column tangled with vines that grew without control.

furni_set_warehouse.name: Warehouse
furni_set_warehouse.desc: The basic layout of the warehouses of logistics companies.

furni_set_s1_01.name: Side Line/ Simple Black-and-white Furniture
furni_set_s1_01.desc: A classic themed design sold at a well-known furniture company in Sami. The design concept focuses on solid colors.

furni_set_s1_02.name: Side Line/ Simple Orange Furniture
furni_set_s1_02.desc: A classic theme of products sold at a well-known furniture company in Sami. Orange is added.

furni_set_specimen.name: Fantastic Bio-documentary
furni_set_specimen.desc: A concept rest area built under the instruction of Kal'tsit. It has the same structure as museum's with surreal elements added.

furni_set_cabin.name: No.12 Life Cycle Cabin
furni_set_cabin.desc: A concept cabin built under the instruction of Kal'tsit. It has the necessary equipment for all kinds of work.

furni_set_s2_01.name: L.G.D. Lounge
furni_set_s2_01.desc: The L.G.D. Lounge, modern and solemn.

furni_set_s2_02.name: Faux Lungmen Lounge
furni_set_s2_02.desc: A lounge imitating the decoration style of Lungmen.

furni_set_wooden.name: Sami Countryside Villa
furni_set_wooden.desc: A concept room imitating Sami's traditional chalet-style. Decorations left in the warehouse for a long time were used in building the room.

furni_set_artdeco.name: Colombian Modern Hotel
furni_set_artdeco.desc: A concept room imitating the standard style of Modern Hotel. It's reminiscent of the splendor of Colombia before the modern era.

furni_set_chen.name: Ch'en's Office
furni_set_chen.desc: A room imitating the office of Inspector Ch'en. It's used by Ch'en and plays an amazing role at Rhodes Island.

furni_set_beach.name: Siesta Beach Hut
furni_set_beach.desc: A conceptual room that recreates the scene of coastal city Siesta in a festival. Hasn't the party started yet?

furni_set_guitar.name: Rhodes Island Modern Music Rehearsal Room
furni_set_guitar.desc: One of the music rehearsal rooms at Rhodes Islands. Open for free to Operators who love playing guitar.

furni_set_safetyZone.name: Airtight Anti-Chemical Safety Cabin
furni_set_safetyZone.desc: A sterile chamber with antibacterial and anti-chemical protection facilities. Only for use for emergencies and tasks that pose an imminent risk to health.

furni_set_rococo.name: Reimselar Ballroom
furni_set_rococo.desc: A recreation of a ballroom from the small, faroff country of Reimselar. A light between the mountains.

furni_set_spirit.name: Secret Occult Society
furni_set_spirit.desc: These decorations will make your cabin look spooky and special. Aesthetics approved by the Occult Club.

furni_set_penguin.name: Penguin Logistics Safehouse
furni_set_penguin.desc: A safehouse designed in collaboration with Penguin Logistics. The design has already been submitted to Rhodes Island.

furni_set_elite.name: Rhodes Island Workstation
furni_set_elite.desc: The Rhodes Island Workstation is primarily for use by elite Operators for designing, development, and maintenance work demanded by their missions.

furni_set_restaurant.name: Lungmen Eatery
furni_set_restaurant.desc: This design was inspired by the warmth and hospitality of a traditional Lungmen eatery. Welcome the holidays and regale your guests!

furni_set_lightFood.name: Healthy Diner
furni_set_lightFood.desc: A groundbreaking fast food experience, now hiring staff. Great food and great taste should always go hand-in-hand.

furni_set_beerhouse.name: Seven Cities-style Restaurant
furni_set_beerhouse.desc: A room that reproduces the atmosphere of a Seven Cities restaurant. Is the food to your liking?

furni_set_dormW.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Lounge
furni_set_dormW.desc: A lounge built in the style of Sarkaz. Here, danger and comfort coexist.

furni_set_community.name: Ursus Student Clubroom
furni_set_community.desc: A clubroom set up by five students from Ursus using their own paychecks. A handshake is only the beginning of a friendship.

furni_set_nightView.name: Leithanien Nights
furni_set_nightView.desc: A room that reproduces the nightlife of Leithania. After the curtain of night falls, music rises to accompany it.

furni_set_office.name: Rhodes Island HR Office
furni_set_office.desc: One of the offices used by the Rhodes Island HR Department, responsible for screening potential suitable Operators every day.

furni_set_bolivar.name: Tribal Inn
furni_set_bolivar.desc: A conceptual reproduction of a tribal-style inn. A world where the fist speaks the loudest.

furni_set_midAutumn.name: Yen Reception Hall
furni_set_midAutumn.desc: A room that imitates the atmosphere of traditional Yen holidays. The moon rises; let the festivities begin.

furni_set_fNearl.name: Nearls' Living Room Replica
furni_set_fNearl.desc: A living room reproduction financed by Zofia and constructed by Maria. It's quite different compared to the one before.

furni_set_activity.name: Golden Game Room
furni_set_activity.desc: A room just for the kids to play in. Hope they have a good time.

furni_set_kitchen.name: White Horizons
furni_set_kitchen.desc: A concept room based on an award-winning design. When asked for comment, the winner had nothing to say at all. The design speaks for itself.

furni_set_prison.name: Mansfield Prison Cell
furni_set_prison.desc: Your run-of-the-mill prison cell. Normally, you wouldn't find a cell like this in Rhodes Island, but perhaps someone really wanted to spend a night in one to satiate their inner desires.
